channel.description: Recent content in R on Antoine Pissoort

item.title: Bayesian methods in Extreme Value Theory
item.author: antoine.pissoort@gmail.com (Antoine Pissoort)
item.description: We found that evdbayes package typically uses the Metropolis-Hastings (MH) algorithm as MCMC sampler. We are aware that this probably not the most efficient algorithm available in the literature, but it is “easy” to implement and understand. Beware : We do not know if it is either the MH or the Gibbs sampler which is implemented when doing simulations with this package. (Hartmann and Ehlers 2016) state in their article that it is the MH but in the package’s source functions we see that this is rather the Gibbs sampler.
